data.title: Richard Stiennon on LinkedIn: Josh is the best podcast host.
data.meta_description: Josh is the best podcast host.
data.text:
Reposting this in light of Microsoft outage and since Richard Stiennon mentioned CrowdStrike in our last discussion, saying he would "hold CrowdStrike." Has that changed? Head over to Richard's LinkedIn page to see what he thinks is happening in the market right now from an investment standpoint. #microsoft #outage #cybersecurity #microsoftoutage Shawn Riley, Igor Volovich, Chad Boeckmann, Charles Payne, what do you think about this outage and how would it impact CrowdStrike's place in the market?

I was back out and about across London yesterday meeting with some awesome people and drinking probably too much coffee. I have to mention 45 Jermyn Street near Piccadilly Circus, really great location to talk and hear each other, and the coffee wasn't bad either. Recording a podcast episode today with Shane Cough talking about his journey with Pointillist and Genesys. It's all about 0-10 million dollars in a few short years. $0- $10million is a super hot topic at the moment, so many companies are somewhere on this journey. We will hear why attracted Shane to the opportunity, what made him take it, what enabled him to have early success! If you are looking to hire your first sales person, this should be a great episode for you. #saassales #saasstartups #techsales #techstartups #cybersecurity #fintech #dataanalytics #artificialintelligence #salesenablement

Hey everyone! I‚Äôm starting a new podcast and I'm on the lookout for guests who are passionate about money-making, startups, or cybersecurity. If you‚Äôve got some interesting insights, experiences, or stories to share, I‚Äôd love to have you on the show! Why join? Share your expertise with a broader audience Network with other industry enthusiasts Have some fun and interesting conversations If you're interested, drop me a message or comment below. Let‚Äôs create some awesome content together! #Podcast #GuestInvitation #MoneyMaking #Startups #Cybersecurity

üöÄ Excited to share the latest insights from our Cybersecurity Startup Revenue Podcast episode featuring Hed Kovetz, CEO and co-founder of Silverfort! üéôÔ∏è In this episode, Hed talks about THREE decisions that he and his co-founders made that shaped Silverfort's trajectory: 1Ô∏è‚É£ Build Partnerships Early: Building relationships with the right partners, including smaller, innovative boutique firms, has been pivotal for Silverfort's growth. Hed emphasizes the need to invest time and belief in such partnerships, even when the payoff might not be until some time much further in the future. 2Ô∏è‚É£ VERY different product approach: Hed and his team took a slow and responsible approach to building their product, focusing on product-market fit and taking a very different approach than the rest of the products in the market. Their conviction in disrupting an established market has led to significant rewards, emphasizing the power of perseverance and long-term vision. 3Ô∏è‚É£ Invest in Employees: During challenging times, showing care and investment in employees as individuals fosters loyalty and a sense of ownership. The supportive, transparent environment at Silverfort has led to a low employee attrition rate, highlighting the importance of prioritizing the team's well-being. Tune in to the episode for in-depth insights into building a successful cybersecurity startup and stay tuned for more valuable content coming your way! https://lnkd.in/df_hfcEn üåêüíª #Cybersecurity #StartupSuccess #StrategicPartnerships #EmployeeInvestment #PodcastInsights

On the newest episode of the Metal Steel Manufacturing Podcast, our founder and expert in technology distribution and cybersecurity software, Joe Graci, had a fascinating chat with host Greg Sheldon. In this piece, they have broken down their lively conversation, sharing valuable insights on how challenges can be turned into growth opportunities in the metal steel manufacturing industry. Explore the core concepts that are invaluable for businesses striving to survive and thrive in the competitive landscape of the technological future. üöÄ Explore the conversation here: https://lnkd.in/gHiudUHF #metalindustry #Innovation #ManufacturingIndustry #Technology #Podcast #AI #BusinessGrowth #Leadership #CultureChange #PrivateEquity #MetalSteel #B2Becommerce #DigitalTransformation #Cybersecurity #Distribution #RevolutionizeManufacturing

üéôÔ∏è Exciting New Episode Alert! üéß Tune in to the latest episode of the Cyber Inspiration Podcast, where host Evgeniy Kharam dives deep into the dynamic journey of cybersecurity startup Cypienta with their Co-Founder & CEO, Ezz T.! In this captivating conversation, Ezz shares insights into Cypienta's transformative journey, from its inception to its strategic pivot towards addressing more substantial challenges in the cybersecurity landscape. üöÄ Key highlights include: üîπ The challenges and triumphs of leadership in the startup sphere üîπ The critical importance of assembling the right team for success üîπ Strategies for effectively integrating sales tactics into a tech-driven business model üîπ Valuable lessons learned from setbacks and failures üîπ The impact of avoiding bottlenecks on organizational growth üîπ Prioritizing work-life balance amidst the demands of entrepreneurship This episode is a must-listen for aspiring entrepreneurs, cybersecurity enthusiasts, and anyone fascinated by the intersection of technology and business! Don't miss out‚Äîstream now on the Cyber Inspiration Podcast! üåü Full Episode: https://lnkd.in/gEQdrqkv #CyberSecurity #StartupJourney #TechEntrepreneurship #LeadershipInsights #WorkLifeBalance #Hacker #CEO #ceomindset

üéôÔ∏è Throwback Episode with Justin Beals, CEO & Co-Founder at Strike Graph! What is the importance of failure in gaining entrepreneurial experience, and the difference between aspirational and practical problem-solving in business development? Check out this throwback podcast episode. Understand the advancements AI is making across various industries and what the future may hold for companies in the cybersecurity space. Find out how security compliance certification can build customer trust. üéß Tune in now on iTunes or Soundcloud! https://lnkd.in/eXi6uzwP If you like this podcast, please subscribe and review! #Entrepreneurship #BusinessDevelopment #AI #Cybersecurity #SecurityCompliance
